Package com.elte.supplymanagersystem.controllers

Class CompanyController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.elte.supplymanagersystem.controllers.CompanyController
  • @CrossOrigin
@RestController
@RequestMapping("/companies")
public class CompanyController
extends Object
    The Company Controller is responsible for: creating Endpoints and wiring User and Company Services

    • Method Detail

      • getAll

        @GetMapping("")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getAll​(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
        Returns all the Companies from CompanyService based on the Role of the logged in User. Calls getAll method from CompanyService. Returns UNAUTHORIZED if the user is Invalid.
        Parameters:
        auth - Authentication parameter for Security in order to get the User who logged in.
        Returns:
        Returns a ResponseEntity with All the Companies in the Database.

      • get

        @GetMapping("/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity get​(@PathVariable
                                                   Long id,
                                                   org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
        Returns the Company with the given ID from CompanyService based on the Role of the logged in User. Calls getById method from CompanyService. Returns UNAUTHORIZED if the user is Invalid.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the Company to get.
        auth - Authentication parameter for Security in order to get the User who logged in.
        Returns:
        Returns a ResponseEntity of the Company with the given ID.

      • getCompanyOfLoggedInUser

        @GetMapping("/mycompany")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getCompanyOfLoggedInUser​(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
        Returns the Workplace of the logged in User with the help of CompanyService. Calls getCompanyOfLoggedInUser method from CompanyService. Returns UNAUTHORIZED if the user is Invalid.
        Parameters:
        auth - Authentication parameter for Security in order to get the User who logged in.
        Returns:
        Returns a ResponseEntity with the Company of the user who logged in.

      • put

        @PutMapping("/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity put​(@RequestBody
                                                   CompanyDTO companyDTO,
                                                   @PathVariable
                                                   Long id,
                                                   org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
        Updates a Company by ID based on User Role. Calls putById method from CompanyService. Returns UNAUTHORIZED if the user is Invalid.
        Parameters:
        companyDTO - The Company with the updated information.
        id - The ID of the Company to update.
        auth - Authentication parameter for Security in order to get the User who logged in.
        Returns:
        Returns a ResponseEntity with the updated record.

      • post

        @PostMapping("register")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity post​(@RequestBody
                                                    CompanyDTO companyDTO,
                                                    org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
        Creates a new record of Company. Calls addCompany method from CompanyService. Returns UNAUTHORIZED if the user is Invalid.
        Parameters:
        companyDTO - The company with the information to save.
        auth - Authentication parameter for Security in order to get the User who logged in.
        Returns:
        Returns a ResponseEntity with the saved record.

      • disable

        @PutMapping("/{id}/disable")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity disable​(@PathVariable
                                                       Long id,
                                                       org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
        Disables a Company by ID. Calls disableCompany method from CompanyService. Returns UNAUTHORIZED if the user is Invalid.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the User to disable.
        auth - Authentication parameter for Security in order to get the User who logged in.
        Returns:
        Returns a ResponseEntity: OK if the deletion was successful and NotFound if the record was not found.

      • enable

        @PutMapping("/{id}/enable")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity enable​(@PathVariable
                                                      Long id,
                                                      org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
        Enables a User by ID. Calls enableUser method from UserService. Returns UNAUTHORIZED if the user is Invalid.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the User to disable.
        auth - Authentication parameter for Security in order to get the User who logged in.
        Returns:
        Returns a ResponseEntity: OK if the deletion was successful and NotFound if the record was not found.

      • delete

        @DeleteMapping("/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity delete​(@PathVariable
                                                      Long id,
                                                      org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
        Deletes a record by ID. Calls deleteById method from CompanyService. Returns UNAUTHORIZED if the user is Invalid.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the Company to delete.
        auth - Authentication parameter for Security in order to get the User who logged in.
        Returns:
        Returns a ResponseEntity: OK if the deletion was successful and NotFound if the record was not found.
